EmailTemplate.subject: Just under two weeks until kick-off!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
In this issue: get involved in our social media competition; how to give feedback on role training; Bite the Ballot's #TurnUp campaign; 5 minutes with Emily Bowyer, and more!
NCS Summer 2016 starts 18th June! In just under two weeks our first wave of young people will embark on their NCS journeys, supported by our brilliant seasonal staff, and we can't wait for the madness to truly begin!
If you're working on the first wave, make sure you share your adventures with us on social media. If you haven't been placed on a wave yet, don't worry! Make sure you keep your availability up-to-date on the Choosing when I can work and Dates when I can't work pages, and stay in touch with your staffing team.
Emily tells us the ups and downs of the Programme Leader role (below)
Before training download an electronic version of your role guide here!
Get involved with Bite the Ballot and encourage others to #TurnUp on 23 June.
5 minutes with... Emily Bowyer
Occupation: Project Leader specialising in community development My last role on NCS was... I was a Programme Leader in Autumn 2015, and I've also worked in the Staffing Team as a core staff member. This year on NCS I will... I'm going to be a PL again this summer, and I'm going to have a lot of games up my sleeve for those quiet moments. Most rewarding part of NCS: When the young people no longer need to be led. They've gone from strangers to friends, supporting each other through the programme. Most challenging part: Keeping the attention of 60 young people, especially when trying to relay important (but tedious) information. When I'm not working on NCS, you will find me... Planning my next trip away, working on a new project, or eating. NCS soundtrack? 'Hotline Bling' by Drake. Clearly the content has nothing to do with NCS, but the young people played it all the time!
Register to vote with Bite the Ballot - deadline 7th June! With the EU Referendum coming up soon (23rd June!), it's time to make sure you're registered to vote! You have until midnight tonight to register. Alone, you may believe you have little influence. But together no one can ignore us. If you're unsure about politics and your power to drive change, that's ok. Come on this journey with us - take power and register now!
Join our NCS Sales team full time We're looking for energetic and passionate individuals to join our Sales team as Engagement Coordinators. Help us spread the word about our NCS programmes around schools and colleges. Find out more here.
Give your feedback on role training! New for 2016 - once you've attended your role training, you'll have the chance to tell us what you think worked at training, and what we should do going forward. You can find our Training Feedback Survey on your Booking Training page.
Staffing spotlight: West Midlands Our team's go go go, with the programme kicking off in 2 weeks, we're busy answering last-minute calls and emails, and dealing with the dreaded drop-outs... and we can't wait to see what the summer brings!
